name: FGameplayCueNotify_SoundInfo
doc:
FGameplayCueNotify_SoundInfo

    Properties that specify how to play a sound effect.

SpawnConditionOverride: Condition to check before playing the sound.
PlacementInfoOverride: Defines how the sound will be placed.
LoopingFadeOutDuration: How long it should take to fade out.  Only used on looping gameplay cues.
LoopingFadeVolumeLevel:
The volume level you want the sound to fade out to over the 'Looping Fade Out Duration' before stopping.
This value is irrelevant if the 'Looping Fade Out Duration' is zero.
NOTE: If the fade out duration is positive and this value is not lower than the volume the sound is playing at, the sound will never stop!
SoundParameterInterfaceInfo: Defines how to interface with the sound.
bOverrideSpawnCondition: If enabled, use the spawn condition override and not the default one.
bOverridePlacementInfo: If enabled, use the placement info override and not the default one.
bUseSoundParameterInterface: If enabled, use the placement info override and not the default one.
